SELECT t_object.Name as [Element], t_object.Author, t_objectproblems.Problem, t_objectproblems.Status, t_objectproblems.Priority, t_objectproblems.ReportedBy as [Owner],t_objectproblems.DateReported, t_objectproblems.ResolvedBy as [Editor], t_objectproblems.DateResolved as [Effective], t_objectproblems.[Version], t_objectproblems.ProblemType, t_objectproblems.Object_ID, 't_objectproblems' as CLASSTABLE FROM t_objectproblems, t_object WHERE t_objectproblems.ProblemType = 'Decision' AND t_objectproblems.Object_ID = t_object.Object_ID AND t_objectproblems.DateReported IS NOT NULL AND t_objectproblems.DateResolved IS NULL AND t_objectproblems.Status = 'Verified'
ORDER BY t_objectproblems.ResolvedBy ASC

SELECT a2525.name as name, a2525.ea_guid as CLASSGUID, a2525.Object_Type as CLASSTYPE, SIDC.value as Code from t_object AS a2525 inner join t_objectproperties SIDC on (SIDC.Object_ID = a2525.Object_ID AND SIDC.Property = 'Function ID') where SIDC.value LIKE '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#'

select distinct o.ea_guid as CLASSGUID,o.Object_Type as CLASSTYPE,o.Name as Name, o.Stereotype, package.name as PackageName ,package_p1.name as PackageLevel1,package_p2.name as PackageLevel2 ,package_p3.name as PackageLevel3 from ((((((((((((((((( t_object o left join t_diagramobjects dob on dob.[Object_ID] = o.[Object_ID]) left join t_object inst on inst.[Classifier] = o.[Object_ID]) left join t_objectproperties otv on otv.VALUE = o.[ea_guid]) left join t_connectortag ctv on ctv.VALUE = o.[ea_guid]) left join t_attributetag atv on atv.VALUE = o.[ea_guid]) left join t_operationtag optv on optv.VALUE = o.[ea_guid]) left join t_object u on u.Pdata1 = o.ea_guid) left join t_connector cs on cs.Start_Object_ID = o.Object_ID) left join t_connector ce on ce.End_Object_ID = o.Object_ID) left join t_attribute att on att.Classifier like o.Object_ID) left join t_operation op on op.Classifier like o.Object_ID) left join t_operationparams opp on opp.Classifier like o.Object_ID) left join t_object owned on owned.ParentID = o.Object_ID) inner join t_package package on o.package_id = package.package_id) left join t_package package_p1 on package_p1.package_id = package.parent_id) left join t_package package_p2 on package_p2.package_id = package_p1.parent_id) left join t_package package_p3 on package_p3.package_id = package_p2.parent_id) where o.Package_ID in (#Branch#) and (o.name is null or o.Name like '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#') and o.Object_Type not in ('Package') and (o.Stereotype is null or o.Stereotype not in ('model document')) and dob.Object_ID is null and inst.Object_ID is null and otv.VALUE is null and ctv.Value is null and atv.Value is null and optv.Value is null and u.Object_ID is null and cs.Start_Object_ID is null and ce.End_Object_ID is null and att.Classifier is null and op.Classifier is null and opp.Classifier is null and owned.Object_ID is null

SELECT a2525.name as name, a2525.ea_guid as CLASSGUID, a2525.Object_Type as CLASSTYPE, SIDC.value as Code from t_object AS a2525 inner join t_objectproperties SIDC on (SIDC.Object_ID = a2525.Object_ID AND SIDC.Property = 'ID') where SIDC.value LIKE '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#'

ORDER BY ModifiedDate ASC

SELECT t_object.Name as [Element], t_object.Author, t_objecttests.Test, t_objecttests.Status, t_objecttests.TestType, t_objecttests.RunBy, t_objecttests.CheckBy, t_objecttests.DateRun, t_objecttests.TestClass, 't_objecttests' as CLASSTABLE, t_objecttests.Object_ID FROM t_objecttests, t_object
WHERE t_objecttests.Object_ID = t_object.Object_ID AND (t_objecttests.RunBy is null OR t_objecttests.DateRun is null)

SELECT t_object.Name as [Element], t_object.Author, t_objecttests.Test, t_objecttests.Status, t_objecttests.TestType, t_objecttests.RunBy, t_objecttests.CheckBy, t_objecttests.DateRun, t_objecttests.TestClass, 't_objecttests' as CLASSTABLE, t_objecttests.Object_ID FROM t_objecttests, t_object
WHERE t_objecttests.Object_ID = t_object.Object_ID AND t_objecttests.DateRun >= #Now - <Search Term># AND t_objecttests.DateRun < #Now +1d# AND t_objecttests.CheckBy is null

SELECT ea_guid AS CLASSGUID, 't_diagram' as CLASSTABLE, Diagram_Type AS CLASSTYPE, Name, [Version], Author, Stereotype, CreatedDate, Diagram_Type, ModifiedDate FROM t_diagram WHERE t_diagram.Diagram_Type = 'Statechart' ORDER BY ModifiedDate ASC

SELECT TMF_ODAFunctionBlock.Name as 'ODA Function Block' , TMF_ODAComponents.Name as TMF_ODAComponents, TMF_ODAComponents.version as 'Component Version', TMF_ODAComponents.status as 'Component Status', ComponentID.value AS 'Component ID', TMF_ODAComponents.note AS 'Component Description', Specs.FileName as specs FROM t_object AS TMF_ODAComponents INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS ComponentID ON (ComponentID.Object_ID = TMF_ODAComponents.Object_ID AND ComponentID.property= 'ID') FULL outer join t_objectfiles as Specs ON Specs.Object_ID = TMF_ODAComponents.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_connector as connector ON TMF_ODAComponents.Object_ID = connector.Start_Object_ID INNER JOIN t_object AS TMF_ODAFunctionBlock ON connector.End_Object_ID = TMF_ODAFunctionBlock.Object_ID
WHERE TMF_ODAComponents.Stereotype='TMF_ODAComponents' AND TMF_ODAFunctionBlock.Stereotype= 'TMF_ODAFunctionBlock' AND connector.Stereotype='TMF_BlockContainsFunction'
AND ComponentID.value like '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#'

SELECT t_object.Name as [Element], t_object.Author, t_objectproblems.Problem, t_objectproblems.Status, t_objectproblems.Priority, t_objectproblems.ReportedBy,t_objectproblems.DateReported, t_objectproblems.ResolvedBy, t_objectproblems.DateResolved as [Completed], t_objectproblems.[Version], t_objectproblems.ProblemType, t_objectproblems.Object_ID, 't_objectproblems' as CLASSTABLE FROM t_objectproblems, t_object WHERE t_objectproblems.ProblemType = 'Document' AND t_objectproblems.Object_ID = t_object.Object_ID AND t_objectproblems.DateResolved IS NOT NULL AND t_objectproblems.Status = 'Complete' AND t_objectproblems.DateResolved >= #Now - <Search Term># AND t_objectproblems.DateResolved < #Now +1d#

ORDER BY t_objectproblems.ResolvedBy ASC

SELECT ea_guid AS CLASSGUID, 't_diagram' as CLASSTABLE, Diagram_Type AS CLASSTYPE, Name, [Version], Author, Stereotype, CreatedDate, Diagram_Type, ModifiedDate FROM t_diagram WHERE t_diagram.ModifiedDate >= #Now - <Search Term># AND t_diagram.Diagram_Type = 'Statechart' ORDER BY ModifiedDate ASC

select t_secgroup.GroupName, #Concat t_secuser.FirstName, ' ', t_secuser.Surname# as Name, t_files.FileDate, t_files.Notes AS [Note] from t_secuser, t_files, t_secgroup where t_secgroup.GroupID = t_files.Name AND t_secuser.UserID = t_files.Category AND t_files.AppliesTo = 'MCGM' AND t_files.FileDate >= #Now - <Search Term>#
ORDER BY 1,3 DESC

select #Concat Usr1.FirstName, ' and ', Usr2.FirstName# as GroupName, #Concat t_secuser.FirstName, ' ', t_secuser.Surname# as Name, t_files.FileDate, t_files.Notes AS [Note] from t_secuser, t_files, t_secuser as Usr2, t_secuser as Usr1 where t_files.AppliesTo = 'MCGM' AND t_files.Name LIKE Usr1.UserID + '@#WC#' AND t_files.Name LIKE '#WC#@'+Usr2.UserID AND (t_files.Name LIKE '#UserUID#' + '@#WC#' OR t_files.Name LIKE '#WC#@'+ '#UserUID#') AND t_secuser.UserID = t_files.Category AND t_files.FileDate >= #Now - <Search Term>#
UNION ALL
select t_secgroup.GroupName, #Concat t_secuser.FirstName, ' ', t_secuser.Surname# as Name, t_files.FileDate, t_files.Notes AS [Note] from t_secuser, t_files, t_secgroup where t_secuser.UserID = '#UserUID#' AND t_secgroup.GroupID = t_files.Name AND t_secuser.UserID = t_files.Category AND t_files.AppliesTo = 'MCGM' AND t_files.FileDate >= #Now - <Search Term>#
ORDER BY 1 ASC,3 DESC

SELECT t_object.ea_guid AS CLASSGUID, t_object.Object_Type AS CLASSTYPE, t_object.Name AS Object, t_document.Author, t_document.DocDate AS PostDate, t_document.StrContent AS [Note]
FROM t_object, t_document
WHERE t_object.ea_guid = t_document.ElementID AND t_document.ElementType = 'Post' AND t_document.DocDate >= #Now - <Search Term>#
ORDER BY t_document.DocDate ASC

SELECT ea_guid AS CLASSGUID, 't_diagram' as CLASSTABLE, Diagram_Type AS CLASSTYPE, Name, [Version], Author, Stereotype, CreatedDate, Diagram_Type, ModifiedDate FROM t_diagram WHERE t_diagram.ModifiedDate >= #Now - <Search Term># AND t_diagram.Diagram_Type = 'Activity' ORDER BY ModifiedDate ASC

SELECT sourceProcess.Name as Process , aDomain.Name as Domain, vertical.Name as 'Vertical Group', sourceProcess.ea_guid as CLASSGUID, sourceProcess.Object_Type as CLASSTYPE, hierarchyLevel.value as Level, pid.value as 'Process identifier', ouid.value as 'Original Process Identifier', ParentProcess.Name as Parent, uid.value as 'UID', maturity.value as 'Maturity Level', TMFStatus.value as 'Framework Status'
FROM t_object AS sourceProcess FULL OUTER JOIN t_connector as procconnector ON sourceProcess.Object_ID = procconnector.Start_Object_ID FULL OUTER JOIN t_object AS ParentProcess ON procconnector.End_Object_ID = ParentProcess.Object_ID FULL OUTER JOIN t_connector as DomainConnector ON sourceProcess.Object_ID = DomainConnector.Start_Object_ID FULL OUTER JOIN t_object AS aDomain ON DomainConnector.End_Object_ID = aDomain.Object_ID FULL OUTER JOIN t_connector as verticalconnector ON sourceProcess.Object_ID = verticalconnector.Start_Object_ID FULL OUTER JOIN t_object AS vertical ON verticalconnector.End_Object_ID = vertical.Object_ID
INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS hierarchyLevel ON hierarchyLevel.Object_ID = sourceProcess.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS uid ON uid.Object_ID = sourceProcess.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS ouid ON ouid.Object_ID = sourceProcess.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS maturity ON maturity.Object_ID = sourceProcess.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS TMFStatus ON TMFStatus.Object_ID = sourceProcess.Object_ID
INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS pid ON pid.Object_ID = sourceProcess.Object_ID inner join t_objectproperties AS ProcTargetPid ON ProcTargetPid.Object_ID = ParentProcess.Object_ID
WHERE sourceProcess.Stereotype='TMF_Process' AND aDomain.Stereotype='TMF_Domain' AND DomainConnector.Stereotype='TMF_DomainAggregatesProcess' AND verticalconnector.Stereotype='TMF_VerticalAggregatesProcess' and vertical.Stereotype='TMF_Vertical' AND hierarchyLevel.property = 'HierarchyLevel' AND procconnector.Stereotype='TMF_isComposedByProcess' AND ParentProcess.Stereotype='TMF_Process' AND uid.property='uid' AND ouid.property='Original Process identifier' AND maturity.property='Maturity' AND TMFStatus.property='TMFStatus'
AND pid.property = 'Process identifier' AND pid.value ='#WC#<Search Term>#WC#'

SELECT sourceProcess.Name as Process , aDomain.Name as Domain, vertical.Name as 'Vertical Group', sourceProcess.ea_guid as CLASSGUID, sourceProcess.Object_Type as CLASSTYPE, hierarchyLevel.value as Level, pid.value as 'Process identifier', ouid.value as 'Original Process Identifier', ParentProcess.Name as Parent, uid.value as 'UID', maturity.value as 'Maturity Level', TMFStatus.value as 'Framework Status', Issue.Notes as Issue
FROM t_object AS sourceProcess FULL OUTER JOIN t_connector as procconnector ON sourceProcess.Object_ID = procconnector.Start_Object_ID FULL OUTER JOIN t_object AS ParentProcess ON procconnector.End_Object_ID = ParentProcess.Object_ID FULL OUTER JOIN t_connector as DomainConnector ON sourceProcess.Object_ID = DomainConnector.Start_Object_ID FULL OUTER JOIN t_object AS aDomain ON DomainConnector.End_Object_ID = aDomain.Object_ID FULL OUTER JOIN t_connector as verticalconnector ON sourceProcess.Object_ID = verticalconnector.Start_Object_ID FULL OUTER JOIN t_object AS vertical ON verticalconnector.End_Object_ID = vertical.Object_ID
INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS hierarchyLevel ON hierarchyLevel.Object_ID = sourceProcess.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS uid ON uid.Object_ID = sourceProcess.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS ouid ON ouid.Object_ID = sourceProcess.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS maturity ON maturity.Object_ID = sourceProcess.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS TMFStatus ON TMFStatus.Object_ID = sourceProcess.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS Issue ON Issue.Object_ID = sourceProcess.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS briefdescription ON briefdescription.Object_ID = sourceProcess.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS pid ON pid.Object_ID = sourceProcess.Object_ID inner join t_objectproperties AS ProcTargetPid ON ProcTargetPid.Object_ID = ParentProcess.Object_ID
WHERE sourceProcess.Stereotype='TMF_Process' AND aDomain.Stereotype='TMF_Domain' AND DomainConnector.Stereotype='TMF_DomainAggregatesProcess' AND verticalconnector.Stereotype='TMF_VerticalAggregatesProcess' and vertical.Stereotype='TMF_Vertical' AND hierarchyLevel.property = 'HierarchyLevel' AND procconnector.Stereotype='TMF_isComposedByProcess' AND ParentProcess.Stereotype='TMF_Process' AND uid.property='uid' AND ouid.property='Original Process identifier' AND maturity.property='Maturity' AND TMFStatus.property='TMFStatus' AND Issue.property='Issue' AND briefdescription.property='briefdescription' AND pid.property = 'Process identifier' AND pid.value ='<Search Term>'

SELECT t_object.Name as [Element], t_object.Author, t_objecttests.Test, t_objecttests.Status, t_objecttests.TestType, t_objecttests.RunBy, t_objecttests.CheckBy, t_objecttests.DateRun, t_objecttests.TestClass, 't_objecttests' as CLASSTABLE, t_objecttests.Object_ID FROM t_objecttests, t_object WHERE t_objecttests.Status = 'Pass' AND t_objecttests.Object_ID = t_object.Object_ID AND t_objecttests.DateRun >= #Now - <Search Term># AND t_objecttests.DateRun < #Now +1d#
ORDER BY t_objecttests.DateRun ASC

SELECT t_object.Name as [Element], t_object.Author, t_objectproblems.Problem as [Feature], t_objectproblems.Status, t_objectproblems.Priority, t_objectproblems.ReportedBy as [RequestedBy],t_objectproblems.DateReported, t_objectproblems.ResolvedBy, t_objectproblems.DateResolved as [Completed], t_objectproblems.[Version], t_objectproblems.ProblemType, t_objectproblems.Object_ID, 't_objectproblems' as CLASSTABLE FROM t_objectproblems, t_object WHERE t_objectproblems.ProblemType = 'Feature' AND t_objectproblems.Object_ID = t_object.Object_ID AND t_objectproblems.DateReported >= #Now - 90d# AND t_objectproblems.Status LIKE '<Search Term>#WC#'
ORDER BY t_objectproblems.ResolvedBy ASC

SELECT t_object.Name as [Element], t_object.Author, t_objectproblems.Problem, t_objectproblems.Status, t_objectproblems.Priority, t_objectproblems.ReportedBy,t_objectproblems.DateReported, t_objectproblems.ResolvedBy, t_objectproblems.DateResolved, t_objectproblems.[Version], t_objectproblems.ProblemType, t_objectproblems.Object_ID, 't_objectproblems' as CLASSTABLE FROM t_objectproblems, t_object WHERE t_objectproblems.ProblemType = 'Defect' AND t_objectproblems.Object_ID = t_object.Object_ID AND t_objectproblems.DateReported >= #Now - 90d# AND t_objectproblems.Status LIKE '<Search Term>#WC#'
ORDER BY t_objectproblems.ResolvedBy ASC

SELECT t_object.Name as [Element], t_object.Author, t_objectproblems.Problem, t_objectproblems.Status, t_objectproblems.Priority, t_objectproblems.ReportedBy,t_objectproblems.DateReported, t_objectproblems.ResolvedBy, t_objectproblems.DateResolved as [Completed], t_objectproblems.[Version], t_objectproblems.ProblemType, t_objectproblems.Object_ID, 't_objectproblems' as CLASSTABLE FROM t_objectproblems, t_object WHERE t_objectproblems.ProblemType = 'Document' AND t_objectproblems.Object_ID = t_object.Object_ID AND t_objectproblems.DateReported >= #Now - 90d# AND t_objectproblems.Status LIKE '<Search Term>#WC#'
ORDER BY t_objectproblems.ResolvedBy ASC

SELECT t_object.Name as [Element], t_object.Author, t_objectproblems.Problem, t_objectproblems.Status, t_objectproblems.Priority, t_objectproblems.ReportedBy,t_objectproblems.DateReported, t_objectproblems.ResolvedBy, t_objectproblems.DateResolved, t_objectproblems.[Version], t_objectproblems.ProblemType, t_objectproblems.Object_ID, 't_objectproblems' as CLASSTABLE FROM t_objectproblems, t_object WHERE t_objectproblems.ProblemType = 'Issue' AND t_objectproblems.Object_ID = t_object.Object_ID AND t_objectproblems.DateReported >= #Now - 90d# AND t_objectproblems.Status LIKE '<Search Term>#WC#'
ORDER BY t_objectproblems.ResolvedBy ASC

SELECT t_object.Name as [Element], t_object.Author, t_objectproblems.Problem, t_objectproblems.Status, t_objectproblems.Priority, t_objectproblems.ReportedBy,t_objectproblems.DateReported, t_objectproblems.ResolvedBy, t_objectproblems.DateResolved as [Completed], t_objectproblems.[Version], t_objectproblems.ProblemType, t_objectproblems.Object_ID, 't_objectproblems' as CLASSTABLE FROM t_objectproblems, t_object WHERE t_objectproblems.ProblemType = 'ToDo' AND t_objectproblems.Object_ID = t_object.Object_ID AND t_objectproblems.DateReported >= #Now - 90d# AND t_objectproblems.Status LIKE '<Search Term>#WC#'
ORDER BY t_objectproblems.ResolvedBy ASC

select T1.Name as KPIName, op.value as CurrentLevel, op2.value as SatisfactionLevel, t1.ea_guid as classguid from t_object as T1 left join t_objectproperties op on (op.Object_ID=T1.Object_ID) left join t_objectproperties op2 on (op2.Object_ID=T1.Object_ID) WHERE --(T1.Name= 'Average utilization of servers and IT equipment') AND (T1.Stereotype= 'dMeasurementIndicator') AND (op.Property='CurrentLevel') AND (op2.Property='SatisfactionLevel')

SELECT t_object.Name as [Element], t_object.Author, t_objectproblems.Problem, t_objectproblems.Status, t_objectproblems.Priority, t_objectproblems.ReportedBy,t_objectproblems.DateReported, t_objectproblems.ResolvedBy, t_objectproblems.DateResolved as [Completed], t_objectproblems.[Version], t_objectproblems.ProblemType, t_objectproblems.Object_ID, 't_objectproblems' as CLASSTABLE FROM t_objectproblems, t_object WHERE t_objectproblems.ProblemType = 'ToDo' AND t_objectproblems.DateResolved IS NULL AND t_objectproblems.Object_ID = t_object.Object_ID
ORDER BY t_objectproblems.ResolvedBy ASC

SELECT t_object.Name as [Element], t_object.Author, t_objectproblems.Problem as [Feature], t_objectproblems.Status, t_objectproblems.Priority, t_objectproblems.ReportedBy as [RequestedBy],t_objectproblems.DateReported, t_objectproblems.ResolvedBy, t_objectproblems.DateResolved as [Completed], t_objectproblems.[Version], t_objectproblems.ProblemType, t_objectproblems.Object_ID, 't_objectproblems' as CLASSTABLE FROM t_objectproblems, t_object WHERE t_objectproblems.ProblemType = 'Feature' AND t_objectproblems.DateResolved IS NULL AND t_objectproblems.Object_ID = t_object.Object_ID
ORDER BY t_objectproblems.ResolvedBy ASC

SELECT t_object.Name as [Element], t_object.Author, t_objectproblems.Problem, t_objectproblems.Status, t_objectproblems.Priority, t_objectproblems.ReportedBy,t_objectproblems.DateReported, t_objectproblems.ResolvedBy, t_objectproblems.DateResolved as [Completed], t_objectproblems.[Version], t_objectproblems.ProblemType, t_objectproblems.Object_ID, 't_objectproblems' as CLASSTABLE FROM t_objectproblems, t_object WHERE t_objectproblems.ProblemType = 'Documents' AND t_objectproblems.DateResolved IS NULL AND t_objectproblems.Object_ID = t_object.Object_ID
ORDER BY t_objectproblems.ResolvedBy ASC

SELECT t_object.Name as [Element], t_object.Author, t_objectproblems.Problem as [Change], t_objectproblems.Status, t_objectproblems.Priority, t_objectproblems.ReportedBy as [RequestedBy],t_objectproblems.DateReported, t_objectproblems.ResolvedBy, t_objectproblems.DateResolved as [Completed], t_objectproblems.[Version], t_objectproblems.ProblemType, t_objectproblems.Object_ID, 't_objectproblems' as CLASSTABLE FROM t_objectproblems, t_object WHERE t_objectproblems.ProblemType = 'Change' AND t_objectproblems.DateResolved IS NULL AND t_objectproblems.Object_ID = t_object.Object_ID
ORDER BY t_objectproblems.ResolvedBy ASC

SELECT t_object.Name as [Element], t_object.Author, t_objectproblems.Problem, t_objectproblems.Status, t_objectproblems.Priority, t_objectproblems.ReportedBy as [Owner],t_objectproblems.DateReported, t_objectproblems.ResolvedBy, t_objectproblems.DateResolved, t_objectproblems.[Version], t_objectproblems.ProblemType, t_objectproblems.Object_ID, 't_objectproblems' as CLASSTABLE FROM t_objectproblems, t_object WHERE t_objectproblems.ProblemType = 'Event' AND t_objectproblems.Object_ID = t_object.Object_ID AND t_objectproblems.DateReported IS NOT NULL AND t_objectproblems.DateResolved IS NULL AND t_objectproblems.Priority = 'High'
ORDER BY t_objectproblems.ResolvedBy ASC

select o.ea_guid as CLASSGUID, o.Object_Type as CLASSTYPE, o.name as Name ,package.name as 'Package Name' ,package_p1.name as 'Package level -1',package_p2.name as 'Package level -2',package_p3.name as 'Package level -3' from (((( t_object o inner join t_package package on o.package_id = package.package_id) left join t_package package_p1 on package_p1.package_id = package.parent_id) left join t_package package_p2 on package_p2.package_id = package_p1.parent_id) left join t_package package_p3 on package_p3.package_id = package_p2.parent_id) where o.ea_guid='{6FE0E8D5-C7F3-4a3b-ADEA-6F9644B7325F}'

SELECT t_object.ea_guid as classguid , t_object.Object_Type AS CLASSTYPE, t_object.name, pack.[Name] FROM (t_object
inner join t_package pack on pack.[Package_ID] = t_object.Package_ID)
WHERE t_object.Object_Type = 'Class' AND t_object.name LIKE '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#' AND t_object.Stereotype = 'TMF_BusinessEntity'

SELECT t_object.ea_guid AS CLASSGUID, t_package.Name as PackageName, ParentPkg.Name as ParentName, t_object.ModifiedDate, t_object.Author, t_object.[Version], t_object.[Alias], t_object.Object_Type as CLASSTYPE,t_object.Note as Notes FROM t_package, t_object, t_package ParentPkg WHERE t_object.ea_guid = t_package.ea_guid AND t_package.name LIKE '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#' and t_package.Parent_ID = ParentPkg.Package_ID

Field.Filter: (t_diagramobjects.Object_ID IS NULL) AND t_object.Object_Type not in ('Package','Trigger')

RootTable.Filter: select t_object.Name as [Class], 'Operation' as CLASSTYPE, 't_operation' as CLASSTABLE, t_operation.ea_guid as CLASSGUID, t_operation.Name as [Method], t_operation.Abstract, t_operation.Type, t_operation.Notes as [Note], t_operation.Object_ID from t_object, t_operation WHERE t_operation.Name LIKE '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#' AND t_object.Object_ID = t_operation.Object_ID

SELECT ea_guid AS CLASSGUID, 't_diagram' as CLASSTABLE, Diagram_Type AS CLASSTYPE, Name, [Version], Author, Stereotype, CreatedDate, Diagram_Type, ModifiedDate FROM t_diagram WHERE t_diagram.StyleEx like '#WC#KanbanActive=1#WC#' ORDER BY ModifiedDate ASC

SELECT t_object.ea_guid AS CLASSGUID, t_object.Object_Type AS CLASSTYPE, t_object.Name, t_document.[Version] AS Baseline_Version, t_document.Notes AS Baseline_Note, t_document.DocDate AS Baseline_Date, t_object.Object_Type AS [Type],t_object.Stereotype, t_object.Author, t_object.CreatedDate, t_object.ModifiedDate
FROM t_object, t_document
WHERE t_object.ea_guid = t_document.ElementID and t_document.DocType='Baseline'

select t_object.Name as [Class], 'Attribute' as CLASSTYPE, 't_attribute' as CLASSTABLE, t_attribute.ea_guid as CLASSGUID, t_attribute.Name as [Attribute], t_attribute.Scope, t_attribute.Type, t_attribute.Stereotype, t_attribute.Object_ID from t_object, t_attribute where t_attribute.Name LIKE '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#' AND t_object.Object_ID = t_attribute.Object_ID

SELECT t_object.Name as [Element], t_object.Author, t_objecttests.Test, t_objecttests.Status, t_objecttests.TestType, t_objecttests.RunBy, t_objecttests.CheckBy, t_objecttests.DateRun, t_objecttests.TestClass, 't_objecttests' as CLASSTABLE, t_objecttests.Object_ID FROM t_objecttests, t_object WHERE t_objecttests.Status = 'Fail' AND t_objecttests.Object_ID = t_object.Object_ID AND t_objecttests.DateRun >= #Now - <Search Term># AND t_objecttests.DateRun < #Now +1d#
ORDER BY t_objecttests.DateRun ASC

Table.Join: t_object.Object_ID = t_operation.Object_ID AND t_operation.OperationID = t_operationparams.OperationID AND t_operationparams.ea_guid = t_taggedvalue.ElementID

RootTable.Filter:
SELECT source.Name as Process , source.Note as 'extended Description' , briefdescription.Notes as 'brief description', target.Name as Domain, vertical.Name as 'Vertical Group', source.ea_guid as CLASSGUID, source.Object_Type as CLASSTYPE, hierarchyLevel.value as Level, Proctarget.Name as Parent, uid.value as 'UID', pid.value as 'Process identifier', ouid.value as 'Original Process Identifier', maturity.value as 'Maturity Level', TMFStatus.value as 'Framework Status', Issue.Notes as Issue
FROM t_object AS source INNER JOIN t_connector as procconnector ON source.Object_ID = procconnector.Start_Object_ID INNER JOIN t_object AS Proctarget ON procconnector.End_Object_ID = Proctarget.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_connector as connector ON source.Object_ID = connector.Start_Object_ID INNER JOIN t_object AS target ON connector.End_Object_ID = target.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_connector as verticalconnector ON source.Object_ID = verticalconnector.Start_Object_ID INNER JOIN t_object AS vertical ON verticalconnector.End_Object_ID = vertical.Object_ID
INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS hierarchyLevel ON hierarchyLevel.Object_ID = source.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS uid ON uid.Object_ID = source.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS ouid ON ouid.Object_ID = source.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS maturity ON maturity.Object_ID = source.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS TMFStatus ON TMFStatus.Object_ID = source.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS Issue ON Issue.Object_ID = source.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS briefdescription ON briefdescription.Object_ID = source.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS pid ON pid.Object_ID = source.Object_ID
WHERE source.Stereotype='TMF_Process' AND target.Stereotype='TMF_Domain' AND connector.Stereotype='TMF_DomainAggregatesProcess' AND verticalconnector.Stereotype='TMF_VerticalAggregatesProcess' and vertical.Stereotype='TMF_Vertical' AND hierarchyLevel.property = 'HierarchyLevel' AND procconnector.Stereotype='TMF_isComposedByProcess' AND Proctarget.Stereotype='TMF_Process' AND uid.property='uid' AND ouid.property='Original Process identifier' AND maturity.property='Maturity' AND TMFStatus.property='TMFStatus' AND Issue.property='Issue' AND briefdescription.property='briefdescription' AND pid.property = 'Process identifier'
Order by Domain, level ASC

SELECT t_object.ea_guid as classguid , t_object.Object_Type AS CLASSTYPE, t_object.name as eTOM, pack.[Name] as PackageName FROM (t_object inner join t_package pack on pack.[Package_ID] = t_object.Package_ID) WHERE t_object.Object_Type = 'Class' AND t_object.name LIKE '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#' AND t_object.Stereotype = 'TMF_Process'
Select diagram.Diagram_ID, diagram.Name, diagram.Diagram_Type as CLASSTYPE, diagram.ea_guid AS CLASSGUID from t_diagram as diagram where diagram.Notes LIKE '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#'
Select * from t_diagram where t_diagram.Notes LIKE '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#'

SELECT t_diagram.ea_guid AS CLASSGUID, 't_diagram' as CLASSTABLE, t_diagram.Diagram_Type AS CLASSTYPE, t_diagram.Name, t_package.Name as Package, t_diagram.[Version], t_diagram.Author, t_diagram.Stereotype, t_diagram.CreatedDate, t_diagram.Diagram_Type, t_diagram.ModifiedDate FROM t_diagram, t_package WHERE t_diagram.Name LIKE '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#' AND t_diagram.Package_ID = t_package.Package_ID

SELECT t_diagram.ea_guid AS CLASSGUID, 't_diagram' as CLASSTABLE, t_diagram.Diagram_Type AS CLASSTYPE, t_diagram.Name, t_package.Name as Package, t_diagram.Author, t_diagram.Diagram_Type, t_diagram.[Version], t_diagram.Stereotype, t_diagram.CreatedDate, t_diagram.ModifiedDate FROM t_diagram, t_package WHERE t_diagram.Package_ID = t_package.Package_ID AND (t_diagram.Name LIKE '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#' OR t_diagram.Notes LIKE '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#' OR t_diagram.Author LIKE '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#')

SELECT t_object.Name as [Element], t_object.Author, t_objecttests.Test, t_objecttests.Status, t_objecttests.TestType, t_objecttests.RunBy, t_objecttests.CheckBy, t_objecttests.DateRun, t_objecttests.TestClass, 't_objecttests' as CLASSTABLE, t_objecttests.Object_ID FROM t_objecttests, t_object WHERE t_objecttests.Status = 'Deferred' AND t_objecttests.Object_ID = t_object.Object_ID AND t_objecttests.DateRun >= #Now - <Search Term># AND t_objecttests.DateRun < #Now +1d#
ORDER BY t_objecttests.DateRun ASC

Select t_object.ea_guid AS CLASSGUID, t_object.Object_Type AS CLASSTYPE, t_object.Name AS [Element], t_object.Object_Type AS [Type], t_object.Author, t_object.Stereotype, t_object.[Scope], t_object.Status, t_object.Phase, t_document.DocDate AS ModifiedDate from t_object, t_document where t_object.ea_guid = t_document.ElementID AND t_document.ElementType = 'DecisionTree' AND t_object.Name LIKE '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#'

SELECT TMF_ABE.Name as TMF_ABE, HierarchiLevel.value as 'level', TMF_ABE.Note as Docs --, CompID.value, TMF_ODAComponents.Name as TMF_ODAComponents, FROM t_object AS TMF_ODAComponents INNER JOIN t_connector as connector ON TMF_ODAComponents.Object_ID = connector.End_Object_ID INNER JOIN t_object AS TMF_ABE ON connector.Start_Object_ID = TMF_ABE.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS CompID ON (CompID.Object_ID = TMF_ODAComponents.Object_ID AND CompID.property = 'ID') INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS HierarchiLevel ON (HierarchiLevel.Object_ID = TMF_ABE.Object_ID AND HierarchiLevel.property = 'HierarchyLevel')
WHERE TMF_ODAComponents.Stereotype='TMF_ODAComponents' AND TMF_ABE.Stereotype='TMF_ABE' AND connector.Stereotype='TMF_ComponentAggregatesABE' AND CompID.value like '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#'

select source.name as series, target.name as groupname from t_object source join t_connector con on con.Start_Object_ID = source.Object_ID join t_object target on target.Object_ID = con.End_Object_ID
where source.Stereotype='Application' and target.Stereotype='acordCapability' and con.Connector_Type='Aggregation'

select target.Name as groupname, source.Name as series
from ((t_object source
left join t_connector con on con.Start_Object_ID = source.Object_ID) join t_object target on target.Object_ID = con.End_Object_ID)
where source.Stereotype='Role' and target.Stereotype='Application' and con.Connector_Type='Aggregation' and con.Stereotype="Capability"

select distinct pack.Name as [ABE], obj.Name as [Business Entity], 'Attribute' as CLASSTYPE, 't_attribute' as CLASSTABLE, t_attribute.ea_guid as CLASSGUID, t_attribute.Name as [Attribute], t_attribute.Notes from ((t_attribute inner join t_object obj on obj.Object_ID= t_attribute.Object_ID ) inner join t_package pack on pack.[Package_ID] = obj.Package_ID)
where obj.Stereotype = 'TMF_BusinessEntity' and pack.[Package_ID] in (#Branch#) order by pack.Name ASC

select t_authors.AuthorName, t_objectresource.[Resource], t_objectresource.Object_ID from t_authors left join t_objectresource on (t_objectresource.[Resource] = t_authors.AuthorName and (t_objectresource.PercentComplete < 100 OR t_objectresource.PercentComplete IS NULL) AND t_objectresource.DateStart < #Now + 1d# AND t_objectresource.DateEnd >= #Now - 0d#) #DB=JET#or t_objectresource.[Resource] is null#DB=JET# where t_objectresource.[Resource] IS NULL

SELECT t_connector.Connector_ID, t_connector.Name as link, diagram.Diagram_ID, diagram.Name, diagram.Diagram_Type as CLASSTYPE, diagram.ea_guid AS CLASSGUID from t_connector inner join t_diagramlinks link on link.ConnectorID = t_connector.Connector_ID Inner join t_diagram diagram on diagram.Diagram_ID = link.DiagramID where t_connector.Connector_Type='Association' AND t_connector.SubType='Class' AND link.Hidden=0 Order by link ASC

select target.Name as Series, op.value as Cost, op2.value as MaturityAsIs, op3.value as MaturityToBe from (((t_object target
left join t_objectproperties op on (op.Object_ID=target.Object_ID)) left join t_objectproperties op2 on (op2.Object_ID=target.Object_ID)) left join t_objectproperties op3 on (op3.Object_ID=target.Object_ID))
where target.Stereotype='AcordCapability' AND op.Property= 'Cost' AND op2.Property= 'Maturity-As-Is' AND op3.Property= 'Maturity-To-Be'

SELECT SUM(cost_prop.Value) AS ChartValue, tam_app.Name AS Series FROM t_object AS app INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS cost_prop ON cost_prop.Object_ID = app.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS type_prop ON type_prop.Object_ID = app.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS maint_prop ON maint_prop.Object_ID = app.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_package AS pkg ON pkg.Package_ID = app.Package_ID INNER JOIN t_connector AS conn ON conn.Start_Object_ID = app.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_object AS tam_app ON conn.End_Object_ID = tam_app.Object_ID WHERE app.Stereotype = 'dApplicationComponent'
AND cost_prop.Property = 'Cost' AND type_prop.Property = 'Category' AND type_prop.Value = 'Custom'
AND tam_app.Stereotype = 'dLogicalAppComponent'
GROUP BY tam_app.Name ORDER BY SUM(cost_prop.Value) DESC Limit 15;

select target.Name as groupname, source.Name as series
from ((t_object source
left join t_connector con on con.Start_Object_ID = source.Object_ID) join t_object target on target.Object_ID = con.End_Object_ID)
where source.Stereotype='Role' and target.Stereotype='Application' and con.Connector_Type='Dependency' and con.Stereotype='Senior Role'

select target.Name as groupname, source.Name as series
from ((t_object source
left join t_connector con on con.Start_Object_ID = source.Object_ID) join t_object target on target.Object_ID = con.End_Object_ID)
where source.Stereotype='Application' and target.Stereotype='Organization' and con.Connector_Type='Aggregation'

SELECT ea_guid AS CLASSGUID, 't_diagram' as CLASSTABLE, Diagram_Type AS CLASSTYPE, Name, [Version], Author, Stereotype, CreatedDate, Diagram_Type, ModifiedDate FROM t_diagram WHERE t_diagram.Diagram_Type = 'Activity' ORDER BY ModifiedDate ASC

SELECT t_object.Name as [Element], t_object.Author, t_objectresource.[Role], t_objectresource.[Resource], t_objectresource.PercentComplete, t_objectresource.DateStart, t_objectresource.DateEnd, 't_objectresource' as CLASSTABLE, t_objectresource.Object_ID FROM t_objectresource, t_object WHERE (t_objectresource.PercentComplete < 100 OR t_objectresource.PercentComplete IS NULL) AND t_objectresource.DateStart < #Now + 1d# AND t_objectresource.DateEnd >= #Now - 0d# AND t_objectresource.Object_ID = t_object.Object_ID

SELECT source.Name as Process , source.Note as 'extended Description' , briefdescription.Notes as 'brief description', target.Name as Domain, vertical.Name as 'Vertical Group', source.ea_guid as CLASSGUID, source.Object_Type as CLASSTYPE, hierarchyLevel.value as Level, Proctarget.Name as Parent, uid.value as 'UID', pid.value as 'Process identifier', ouid.value as 'Original Process Identifier', maturity.value as 'Maturity Level', TMFStatus.value as 'Framework Status', Issue.Notes as Issue
FROM t_object AS source INNER JOIN t_connector as procconnector ON source.Object_ID = procconnector.Start_Object_ID INNER JOIN t_object AS Proctarget ON procconnector.End_Object_ID = Proctarget.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_connector as connector ON source.Object_ID = connector.Start_Object_ID INNER JOIN t_object AS target ON connector.End_Object_ID = target.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_connector as verticalconnector ON source.Object_ID = verticalconnector.Start_Object_ID INNER JOIN t_object AS vertical ON verticalconnector.End_Object_ID = vertical.Object_ID
INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS hierarchyLevel ON hierarchyLevel.Object_ID = source.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS uid ON uid.Object_ID = source.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS ouid ON ouid.Object_ID = source.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS maturity ON maturity.Object_ID = source.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS TMFStatus ON TMFStatus.Object_ID = source.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS Issue ON Issue.Object_ID = source.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS briefdescription ON briefdescription.Object_ID = source.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS pid ON pid.Object_ID = source.Object_ID
WHERE source.Stereotype='TMF_Process' AND target.Stereotype='TMF_Domain' AND connector.Stereotype='TMF_DomainAggregatesProcess' AND verticalconnector.Stereotype='TMF_VerticalAggregatesProcess' and vertical.Stereotype='TMF_Vertical' AND hierarchyLevel.property = 'HierarchyLevel' AND procconnector.Stereotype='TMF_isComposedByProcess' AND Proctarget.Stereotype='TMF_Process' AND uid.property='uid' AND ouid.property='Original Process identifier' AND maturity.property='Maturity' AND TMFStatus.property='TMFStatus' AND Issue.property='Issue' AND briefdescription.property='briefdescription' AND pid.property = 'Process identifier'
Order by Domain, level ASC

select t_objectresource.[Resource], t_projectroles.Role as Series, count(*) as Resource_Count, sum(t_objectresource.ActualHours) as Total_Time_Taken, sum(t_objectresource.ExpectedHours) as Total_Time_Expected from t_objectresource, t_projectroles where t_objectresource.[Role] like #Concat t_projectroles.Role, '#WC#'# and t_objectresource.DateStart >= #Now-30d# group by t_projectroles.Role, t_objectresource.[Resource]

select t_objectresource.[Resource], t_objectresource.[Role] as GroupName, count(*) as Resource_Count, sum(t_objectresource.ActualHours) as Total_Time_Taken, sum(t_objectresource.ExpectedHours) as Total_Time_Expected from t_objectresource where t_objectresource.DateStart >= #Now-30d# group by t_objectresource.[Role], t_objectresource.[Resource]

select t_object.ea_guid AS CLASSGUID, t_object.Object_Type AS CLASSTYPE, t_objectresource.[Resource], t_objectresource.[Role], t_objectresource.DateStart, t_objectresource.DateEnd, t_objectresource.[Time] AS AllocatedHours, t_objectresource.ExpectedHours, t_objectresource.ActualHours, t_objectresource.PercentComplete, t_object.Name, t_object.Alias from t_objectresource, t_object where t_object.Object_ID = t_objectresource.Object_ID and t_objectresource.DateStart >= #Now-30d# and t_objectresource.[Role] like '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#'

select t_object.ea_guid AS CLASSGUID, t_object.Object_Type AS CLASSTYPE, t_objectresource.[Resource], t_objectresource.[Role], t_objectresource.DateStart, t_objectresource.DateEnd, t_objectresource.[Time] AS AllocatedHours, t_objectresource.ExpectedHours, t_objectresource.ActualHours, t_objectresource.PercentComplete, t_object.Name, t_object.Alias from t_objectresource, t_object where t_object.Object_ID = t_objectresource.Object_ID and t_objectresource.DateStart >= #Now-30d# and t_objectresource.[Resource] like '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#'

SELECT a2525.name as name, a2525.ea_guid as CLASSGUID, a2525.Object_Type as CLASSTYPE, SIDC.value as Code from t_object AS a2525 inner join t_objectproperties SIDC on (SIDC.Object_ID = a2525.Object_ID AND SIDC.Property = 'SIDC') where SIDC.value LIKE '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#'

SELECT a2525.name as name, a2525.ea_guid as CLASSGUID, a2525.Object_Type as CLASSTYPE, SIDC.value as Code from t_object AS a2525 inner join t_objectproperties SIDC on (SIDC.Object_ID = a2525.Object_ID AND SIDC.Property = 'HierarchyCode') where SIDC.value LIKE '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#'
